text.title: Sierre
text.p:
Sierre
( German :
Siders
) is a city in Central
Valais
.
While the city is in the French part of Valais , there is a large German-speaking population and you will encounter many people being fluent in both languages .
Sierre has a a rich cultural heritage but is also known for its wine .

list.item:
Tourist Information

text.p:
The is in the city centre .
There are half-hourly trains from
Brig
and
Visp
, as well as from
Sion
.
Lausanne
and
Geneva
.
Half hourly regional trains connect to the smaller towns .

p.s:
The is around 500 metres from the main station and links to
Crans Montana
.

From the
A9 motorway
north of the city , either exit Sierre-Ouest or Sierre-Est can be taken to access Sierre .
The city centre is quite compact and it is possible to walk to most places .

list.item:
Hôtel de Ville
( Right outside the main entrance to the train station ) .
This building which serves today as town hall was built during the 17th century by Jean-François de Courten as a residence .
It served as a hotel for a long time , where a lot of famous people stayed for long periods .

Château des Vidômes
.
Not accessible to the public .
A castle from the 15th century and Sierre 's oldest building .

Church Sainte-Catherine
.
Baroque style church from the 17th century .

Notre-Dame des Marais
.
The old church of Sierre , built in the 14th century .

The Wine Museum in Sierre-Salgesch
, Rue Ste-Catherine 6 , ☏ +41274563525 , ✉ contact@museeduvin-valais.ch .
March-October W - F 14:00 – 18:00 , Sa - Su 11:00 – 18:00 .
This museum about all things wine is spread out over two villages , with one exposition in Sierre and a different one in nearby .
Both museums are linked by a 6 km long trail through vineyards .
Fr . 6 for both museums .

Foire de Ste-Catherine
.
Monday and Tuesday of the last or second last week of November .

VINEA wine fair
( Around the Hôtel de Ville ) , ☏ +41274563144 , ✉ info@vinea.ch .
Two days in early September .
Wine fair showcasing wines from around Switzerland .
Fr . 30 per day .

Fondation Rilke
, Rue du Bourg 30 , ☏ +41274562646 , ✉ info@fondationrilke.ch .
Tu - Su 14:00 - 18:00 .
A museum dedicated to the work of the poet Rainer Maria Rilke .
It is situated in the 18th century Maison Pancrace de Courten .

Didier de Courten
, Rue du Bourg 1 , ☏ +41274551351 , ✉ info@hotel-terminus.ch .
Tu - Sa 12:00 – 13:00 , 19:00 – 21:00 .
This two-Michelin star restaurant is owned and operated by a renowned Swiss chef .
Offers special menus for vegetarians and other dietary restrictions .
Mains from Fr . 80 , set meal from Fr . 180 .

p.s: Sierre is known for its wine .
